text: right Beyond the Wall of Tears is a 1984 role-playing game adventure for Tunnels & Trolls published by Flying Buffalo. ==Plot summary== Beyond the Wall of Tears is a solo adventure in which the player character's little sister has been kidnapped. ==Reception== Philip L. Wing reviewed Beyond the Wall of Tears in The Space Gamer No. 72. Wing commented that "Beyond the Wall of Tears makes a good, but not excellent, addition to your Tunnels & Trolls solo collection." ==References== Category:Tunnels & Trolls adventures
title: Beyond the Wall of Tears
